---
title: "Report"
output: html_document
params:
  form: NA
  dat: NA
  con: NA
  model: NA
  se: NA
  sample_se: NA
  rep: NA
  alpha: NA
  num: NA
---

```{r setup, fig.height = 5, fig.width = 5, fig.align = "center"}
library(RVIMP)
RVIMP_obj<-RVIMP(formula=params$form,data=params$dat,Z = params$con,residual.model = params$model,keep.ranger = F,seed=params$se)
RVIMP_obj
plot(RVIMP_obj,ask=F)
```


```{r, fig.height = 5, fig.width = 5, fig.align = "center"}
comp_obj<-compare_VIMP_RVIMP(formula = params$form,data = params$dat,residual.model =params$model,seed=params$se)
comp_obj
plot(comp_obj)
```

```{r, fig.height = 5, fig.width = 5, fig.align = "center"}
RVIMP_test_obj<-test.RVIMP(formula = params$form,data = params$dat,Z=params$con,alpha.one.sided = params$alpha,reps=params$rep,residual.model = params$model,sample_seed = params$sample_se,seed=params$se,keep.ranger=F,num.trees=params$num)
RVIMP_test_obj
plot(RVIMP_test_obj)
```
